entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to rain showers overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then to 60 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
